about_the_game:
You are Bob, a brave undercover agent. You are sent on a special mission in a faraway village, where you must find and neutralize a sinister Nazi gang.
An exciting adventure, full of surprises and ridiculous situations is awaiting you! Can you complete the mission and save this odd village?

Game features:


  • Cozy atmosphere of a faraway village in a dense forest.
  • Hilarious story with 15 odd characters, each one with their own quirks and their own story.
  • Sweet 1-bit pixel art graphics made with love.
  • Lovely soundtrack from Nuclear Mushroom Boom that will melt your heart.

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
